title: kOTi manmada
sahitya:
kOti manmatha roopan raaman, sree raaman
kumudha vizhi malarnthE amudhak kani mozhivaan  
[kOti]

anupallavi

naadum anbar uLLam sErum maRaiyaai ninRaan
dheena saraNyan dhEvi seethai maNavaaLan 
[kOti]

caraNam

thOL kaNdaar thOLE kaNdaar
thaaL kaNdaar thaaLE kaNdaar
maamEru malaiyanaiya thiru maarbu kaNdaar
seer migu pon sEvadiyum kingiNiyum
paar pugazh naayaganin pallaaNdu paadum   

[kOti]
